Description: Pottery ostracon, with one line of incised inscription - Coptic (?) from the rim of a vessel, inside rim painted with white band and four black circles.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394059) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394059)
